commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Lili! Liliiii! Where have you gone?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff* Where even is this place? The map isn't helping at all...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yoshiko, I'm so sorry! It's all my fault. I got too overconfident and just wound up getting us all lost...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Don't be sorry! I never would've found the place on my own either... If anything's to blame, it's the magic metropolis Tokyo!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: *Sob* I'll never see Lili again.
Do I see what I think I see? How embarrassing for you to be all sniffly on the side of the road like that, Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Huh?! That voice!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Kasumi! And Eli, too!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Perfect timing! You guys are on the way to Maki and Riko's recital too, right?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: We've been trapped in this labyrinth of the magic metropolis Tokyo, desperately trying to find the concert hall! Are you lost, too?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Huh? I don't think any of us are lost?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: C'mon, you two! Don't you have eyes? Look behind you!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Behind us?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: So then...this is where they're holding the recital?! Karin! We made it! We really made it!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: So we were actually walking towards the concert hall this whole time? I'm so glad! Oh, thank you, Yoshiko!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I think all the crying and hugging is a bit of an overreaction, but...

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* I'm just glad we were all able to make it before the performance started.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It was such an ordeal! We roamed the magic metropolis, we met an alpaca...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? What on earth are you talking about?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Laugh* I...guess you just had to be there! I'm so sorry.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: More importantly! Did you get your present for after the recital?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Of course! Yoshiko knows Riko inside-out, so she picked out our present for her.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh yeah? I bet you got a total weirdo present, huh?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I would never! I picked the ultimate present and it's gonna blow Lili's socks off! What about you?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We've prepared a way more awesome present to kick your so-called ultimate present's butt!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hey now, we're not here to fight. We're here to watch Maki and Riko's recital, right? That's what's most important right now.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: This isn't a fight, it's an officially sanctioned contest! Don't think you've won this!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Officially sanctioned? By who?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Come on, it's already time to go to our seats. Leave your bickering for later. Let's head inside!

commands.speaker: Kasumi, Yoshiko, Karin
commands.line: Okay!
